comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Clicked a link within a windows program.


Actual results:

Most links that I click on inside windows programs always open Firefox with the top half of the Firefox button missing and the rest pushed up to the top, this is only happening within windows applications not from shortcuts stored locally, this appears to be happening mainly in windows XP programs, I will try to get a screenshot but this is happening often but not all of the time.


Expected results:

Firefox should open with the Firefox button showing properly
comments.creator: h.e.kohn824@gmail.com
comments.author: h.e.kohn824@gmail.com
